This patch adds a new helper, TextHelper. In its current state it has only one method (with several overloads): ToSentence. This is basically a port of RoR's to_sentence which is mixed into the Ruby Array class by Rails. It formats a collection for use in a sentence by separating elements with commas and then a connector (like "and") between the last two elements.
I tried my darndest to get the website to build, but couldn't (site build relies on .net-1.1 and .net-1.1 fails on DynamicProxy2), so the documentation patch that I'll attach along with the main one has not been fully tested.
My future plans for this helper include adding Pluralize and Singularize methods.
